feedback_texts: The product quality has exceeded my expectations. Very satisfied with the purchase.
Terrible customer service experience. Nobody answered my calls for days.
Average product, nothing special but does the job adequately.
Outstanding delivery speed and packaging. Will definitely order again!
The item was damaged upon arrival and return process was complicated.
Great value for money. Highly recommend this to others.
Product description was misleading. Not what I expected at all.
Excellent customer support helped resolve my issue quickly.

Return Data.processing_summary: Successfully processed 8 customer feedback entries with 87.5% high confidence results. Overall sentiment trends positive with strong satisfaction in product quality and delivery, but concerns noted around customer service responsiveness.
